CHAT.comment: Home Visit 4; Mot and Chi sit on couch together , book on Mot's lap
Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi a pretty good reader; if reads a word wrong Mot supplies correct (sunny-Sunday , come-came); if Chi pauses long enough Mot provides the next word; this makes things go by pretty smoothly WITHOUT having to write out nasty ASCII soundings out of built; Mot also gives a few encouraging yups and mmhms

u.a: Chi uses finger to hold place at first
melon in watermelon swallowed , barely articulated
MOT blocks Chi from turning page
